title: The High jump
brief_description: Analyses the two dominant styles used in world-class high jumping, the Fosbury Flop and the Straddle. Includes aspects of training and exercises relating to the run-up, jump and flight. Written and narrated by Ron Pickering, edited by Peter Delfgou and photographed by Keith Taylor.
